description.value:
The visitant lets out a loud and horrifying roar. Each creature within @Template[type:emanation|distance:100]{100 feet} must attempt at a Will save.

No matter the result, affected creatures are then temporarily immune to the effect for 1 minute.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 2}.

Critical Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 3}.

source.value: Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God
